com.thinkaurelius.titan.core

Interface TitanEdge

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Edge, com.tinkerpop.gremlin.process.graph.EdgeTraversal, com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Element, com.tinkerpop.gremlin.process.graph.ElementTraversal<com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Edge>, Idfiable, Removable, TitanElement, TitanRelation
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractEdge, CacheEdge, StandardEdge

    public interface TitanEdge
extends TitanRelation, com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Edge
    A TitanEdge connects two TitanVertex. It extends the functionality provided by Blueprint's Edge and is a special case of a TitanRelation.
    Author:
    Matthias Bröcheler (http://www.matthiasb.com)
    See Also:
    Edge, TitanRelation, EdgeLabel

      • vertex

        TitanVertex vertex(com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Direction dir)

      • otherVertex

        TitanVertex otherVertex(com.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Vertex vertex)
        Returns the vertex at the opposite end of the edge.
        Parameters:
        vertex - vertex on which this edge is incident
        Returns:
        The vertex at the opposite end of the edge.
        Throws:
        InvalidElementException - if the edge is not incident on the specified vertex
